Giles & Company Strategic Business Consultants, Inc.

As a strategic leader, corporate executive, entrepreneur, certified coach in high-level management/leadership, it is all about you - how to help you achieve your goals, target growth, streamline operations, increase financial stability, and create disruption and innovation for expansion or sale.  As a Solutions Coach, Facilitator, Executive, and Entrepreneur focusing on your business, I have the honor to work with you, helping you succeed, innovate, and grow.Bringing you my experience of building companies from the bottom up, knowing how to meet a payroll, developing significant IP, manufacturing products, securing major licenses, and making it all work, I am your strategic consultant and coach - knowing your struggles and opportunities as you expand and grow your businesses.  As Founder and CEO of Giles & Company Strategic Business Consultants, Inc., I serve you -  general and global corporations, large and small technology companies and financial institutions. Giles & Company Strategic Business Consultants, Inc., is certified by the SBA as Small Business and Woman Owned. Our Specialties include:  Corporate Planning, Strategic Leadership, Finance, Technology, Business Development, and development of Public/Private Partnerships. We work closely with large and small private corporations in the areas of business and financial services, technology, account planning, disruption and innovation, technology roadmaps, and equity/debt structuring. See us at www.giles-company.com.  Follow us on our LinkedIn or on Twitter (@Sbischak).

As a Vistage Chair, I have served CEOs in the Greater Phoenix Area.  I am a Solutions Coach, Facilitator, Executive, and Entrepreneur focusing on your business.  I have the honor to work with CEOs, helping you succeed and grow your business.Bringing my experience of building companies from the bottom up, knowing how to meet a payroll, developing significant IP, manufacturing products, securing major licenses, and making it all work, I am your coach - knowing your struggles and opportunities as you expand and grow your businesses.
Faculty Associate and Co-Chair for 2013 Municipal Finance Challenge

Susan served as Co-Chair and Leader for ASU's 2013 Municipal Finance Challenge, a successful conference on the changes in Municipal Finance and case studies on Public/Private projects;  Faculty Associate in Economic Development Finance.

KidzMouse, Inc. was a computer accessories company service young children from 18 months to 12 years.  We designed, patented, and sold computer mice, keyboards, and headsets to the worldwide consumer and educational markets.  We had license agreements with Disney, Nickelodean, and Sesame.  Our products were manufactured in China and sold worldwide.

At CBRE, I worked as a team leader with the newly formed Global Consulting Practice.  I was active in new business development and led major teams on strategic consulting for both U.S. and International companies.

recommendations: Lyndon W. Smith
President & Co-Owner, Bio Huma Netics, Inc.
December 15, 2016, Lyndon W. was a client of Susan’s

Susan has introduced me to the world of Vistage.  Before joining, I felt that we could grow our company to $10 to $15 M and then I would need to sell and retire.  We have quickly grown past those thresholds.  Now with the educational sessions, our Vistage group encouragement, and the 1:2:1s with Susan, I have gained the confidence and skills that we can grow our company to over $100 M before I need to worry about transition and that transition has many more options than just selling our company.  Additionally, with this added strength, I have enjoyed feeling like I am giving back some to other associates and new members.  This has been an expanding experience for me and for my Executive Team members.

summary: As a strategic consultant and certified coach, I am dedicated to helping business leaders succeed beyond what they envisioned for their companies, their employees, their community, and themselves.What if I told you that you could expand your business beyond what you ever thought possible?What if I told you that you could share challenges and opportunities with other CEOs and business leaders in an exceptional continuous dialogue with your trusted colleagues and leaders?My team and I are focused on helping you achieve success with your business.  Where privacy is the key, we encourage you and other leaders to strengthen and grow your companies, improve profitability, solve problems, and work through strategic and operational issues. What makes us different?  We are all about you - how you grow your business, how you succeed with your internal teams in a well-defined culture, and how you achieve financial independence for your company.Specialties: Strategic Leadership, Executive Coaching, Business Development, Finance, Operation/Organization Strategies, with technology companies, small and mid-size businesses, private and public corporations, and financial institutions.
name: Susan Giles Bischak
title: CEO and Certified Executive Coach at  Giles & Company Strategic Business Consultants, Inc.
